page.title: 10ECOLOGY
page.content: { Most of the block is{farmland},criss crossed with{roads,footpaths}and{small {streams.}One{recreation}is to go for walks and observe wildlife.Common plants you may encounter are{vetches, {campion,poppy}and{bugle}but{cowslips} and large areas of{bluebells}are also easily spotted.Animals in the area include most common British mammals and{foxes,badgers}and{red deer}are regularly seen.Fields in the area are separated by carefully tended{hawthorn {hedges}and a great variety of birds including{woodpecker,owls,kestrel, {sparrowhawk}and{curlews}have been spotted.Social concerns include local habitat which is being threatened by building,factory pollution and spraying by farmers,which affect the food chains,pollutes the streams and adversely affects the ecology. {
